title: The Ugly Duckling
short_plot_summary: A cygnet is mistakenly raised by a family of ducks, and over time endures ridicule and loneliness, only to later discover his true identity as a beautiful swan.
explanation: A duck, illustrating the family of ducks that raised the cygnet
A sad face, representing the ridicule and loneliness the cygnet experiences
An egg, symbolizing the birth of the main character who is different from the rest
A smiling face, signifying the happiness and acceptance the cygnet experiences after discovering his true self
A swan, representing the main character's true identity
